english: The irregular force is completely irregular .
chinese: 无规则力是完全紊乱的。

english: The natural wind is turbulent or gusty .
chinese: 自然风的特性是紊乱或阵息的。
朱丽雅的妈妈说他精神紊乱。

english: The water of the channel is quite turbulent .
chinese: 水道中的水体是十分紊乱的。

english: You talked of her mind being unsettled .
chinese: 你说到过她的心绪紊乱。
紊乱造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: All other forms of taxation were disorganized .
chinese: 所有其它各种税收都陷入紊乱状态。

english: Turbulence or gusts produce velocity fluctuations .
chinese: 紊乱性或阵息性使速度产生波动。
那种紊乱是难以想象的。

english: His thoughts were in a tangle .
Antibiotics can cause disorders of water and salt metabolism .
chinese: 抗菌素能引起水、盐代谢的紊乱。

english: He was in this state of confused uncertainty, hope, and doubt .
chinese: 他正处在这种捉摸不定，又希望又怀疑的紊乱状态中。

english: A disruption of any part of the digestive system upsets the whole system .
chinese: 其中一部分发生紊乱将会影响整个消化系统。

english: Why are not all organic being blend together in an inextricable chaos ?
chinese: 为什么一切生物不是混合成为不可分解的紊乱状态呢？

english: This natural system is sometimes disturbed, and irregular beats occur .
chinese: 这种天然的系统有时会发生紊乱从而出现不正常的跳动。
